derivation.yuyuan_name: 1920s: from German Transvestit, from Latin trans- 'across' + vestire 'clothe'

entry.def: A transvestite is a person, usually a man, who enjoys wearing clothes normally worn by people of the opposite sex.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who adopts the dress or manner or sexual role of the opposite sex
1. receiving sexual gratification from wearing clothing of the opposite sex
